about_the_game:
Gorilla Adventure welcomes players to a journey in the world of current science that will challenge their ultimate endurance. Ready? Because you are about to embark on a stunning and difficult adventure in the promising world of modern science. At the same time, this engaging platform game will also test players' tactical navigation abilities.

In Gorilla Adventure, players will be accompanied by the strong and determined Gorilla. Unfortunately, your character's movements are limited by an iron box that cannot be removed. This poses a great challenge but also an opportunity to express your primal instincts. Your goal is to guide a gorilla to climb massive and complex structures with... a hammer. Using your skillful control and the power of your hammer, you will need to overcome all challenges to progress further in this journey.

With sophisticated graphics down to every detail, Gorilla Adventure will surely captivate any player. Each step will immerse you in an unparalleled thrill of adventure, presenting a dramatic new challenge.

Regardless of the severity of the challenge, your efforts will yield rewards. And with Gorilla's support and patience, you will overcome all difficulties and find the ultimate mystery of this cutting-edge city!

  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Climb, slip, and soar through the neon-drenched cityscape in Gorilla Adventure! Unleash your inner ape and enjoy the freedom of parkour with primal instincts!
